nodes.text: The Primea fleet was the fleet of the Nikardun Destiny that blockaded the Vak Combine homeworld of Primea in a feigned alliance. The fleet consisted of thirty-six vessels; thirty-two Nikardun destroyers, Nikardun gunboats, and Nikardun missile boats, bolstered by four Nikardun Battle Dreadnoughts including the flagship Deathless. The fleet participated in a battle over Primea when confronted by the Chiss Ascendancy and later the Vak Combine itself.
